title: Software Engineer / Team Leader
items: Led a cross-functional team with full autonomy to oversee product development from inception to completion

Identified and implemented a new CI/CD internal process based on GitHub Actions and Docker

title: Full Stack Software Engineer
items: Designed and developed a distributed gambling system leveraging microservices architecture
Successfully implemented Event Sourcing and CQRS
Utilized RedHat Quarkus for high-performance software development with native Java compilation
Introduced JavaScript frontend automated tests

items: Led a team in designing and developing gambling software to automate workflows and enhance production cycles

Streamlined development processes by implementing coordination and documentation tools

title: Front End Mobile Developer

title: Software Engineer / Technical Coordinator
items: Conducted research and developed NFC solutions to enhance loyalty mechanisms

title: Analyst Developer
